Poco a poco fue generando dinero el pequeño negocio que ubico por eso ahora labora de 8:30 hasta las 21:00pm de lunes a domingos ya que le ha ido muy bien prestando los servicios. 

Unas de sus diicultades es que no haiga luz Angel esta casado y su esposa es ama de casa y tiene hijos pero ya mayores de edad. Unas de sus metas es comprar mas Televisores para su negocio
texts.en: Ten years ago, Angel bought a television so he could rent Play Station and sell CDs.  Also, for his customers, he added snack and beverages sales to his business.  Slowly, his business generated money.   Now he works from 8:30 am until 9:00 pm seven days a week as things have been going well for him.  One of his challenges is that he doesn't have electricity.  Angel is married and his wife takes care of the household chores.  He has children but they are now adults.  One of his goals is to buy more televisions for his business.

loans.use: purchase CDs and movies.

loans.name: John Fredy

texts.es:
John Fredy es un emprendedor que siempre soñó con crear su propio negocio, pues desde muy joven decidió ser independiente y trabajar por su cuenta, hoy en día tiene una tienda y legumbrería en la que ofrece a sus vecinos productos de gran variedad y muy buena calidad.

John Fredy necesita de un préstamo para comprar 2 sillas y mejorar la apariencia del lugar y adicional a esto productos generales para surtir la tienda, los cuales son de gran demanda por parte de sus clientes, pues es conciente que así mejorará sus ventas, y su calidad de vida, sueña con llegar a tener un gran negocio el cual sea reconocido no sólo por sus vecinos si no también en la ciudad.
texts.en:
John Fredy is an entrepreneur that has always dreamed of starting his own business.  Since he was very young, he decided to be independent and work for himself.  Today, he has a store and vegetable stand where he offers his neighbors a wide variety of very good quality products.

John Fredy needs a loan to buy 2 chairs and make improvements to the appearance of his place.  Additionally, he wants to buy general products that are in great demand with his customers to stock his store as he is aware that this is how he will improve his sales and his quality of life.  He dreams of having a leading business that is known not only by his neighbors, but throughout the city.

loans.use: purchase chairs and general merchandise to stock his store.

loans.name: Yadira Del Carmen

texts.es: Yadira Del Carmen de 37 años es madre soltera que tiene que sacar a sus 2 hijos menores de edad. Ella posee una tienda en su vivienda donde vende productos de primera necesidad  con mucho esfuerzo ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues su tienda es la más surtida de la localidad siempre tiene lo que los clientes necesitan con productos de muy buena calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es excelente. Yadira es una mujer muy trabajadora con ganas de salir adelante el crédito que solicita es para la compra granos básicos, detergentes, sopas, fósforos, papel higiénico, café, huevos y leche.
texts.en: Yadira del Carmen is a 37 year-old single mother who has to provide for her 2 minor children.  She has a store in her house where she sells basic consumer goods.  Through a lot of effort, she has been able to develop a solid customer base, as her store is the most well-stocked in the area.  She always has what her customers need, and she carries good quality products at reasonable prices.  In addition, her service is excellent.  Yadira is a very hardworking woman who has a strong desire to succeed.  She will use the loan requested to buy staple grains, detergents, soups, matches, toilet paper, coffee, eggs and milk.

loans.use: to buy staple grains, detergents, soups, matches, toilet paper, coffee, eggs and milk.

loans.name: Rosa Elvira

texts.es:
Rosa es una mujer de 43 años, casada con Jose y madre de dos hijos: Carina de 21 años y Jhonny de 17 años. Viven al sur de la ciudad de Quito que es capital del Ecuador en un barrio urbano marginal llamado "Magdalena Alta". Su esposo se dedica a la construcción.

Su familia se dedicaba a la crianza de animales por lo que hace unos años ella empezó también con el negocio. Rosa compra animales pequeños y los cría hasta venderlos a mejor precio, de esta manera ella aporta con la economía familiar. Nos comenta que ha sido difícil encontrar financiamiento, las grandes instituciones financieras no dan facilidades a los microempresarios que como ella no cuentan con un negocio formal. 

Rosa sueña con construir su propia casa, y para ello debe aumentar su negocio haciendo una inversión y por ello Fundación Alternativa le ha dado su apoyo en otorgarle los recursos económicos que necesita y así su calidad de vida mejore y esté más cerca a cumplir sus sueños.
texts.en:
Rosa is a 43 year-old woman who is married to Jose and is the mother of two children: Carina, 21, and Jhonny, 17.  They live south of the city of Quito, the capital of Ecuador, in a neighborhood on the outskirts of the city called "Magdalena Alta."  Her husband works in construction.

Her family used to raise animals, and so a few years ago she also started in this business.  Rosa buys young animals and raises them until she can sell them at a better price.  In this way she contributes to the household finances.  She tells us that it has been difficult to find financing through the big financial institutions, because they will not give loans to small businesspeople like her that have an informal business.

Rosa dreams of building her own house.  To do this, she must expand her business by investing in it.  To achieve this objective,  Fundación Alternativa has given her support by granting her access to the resources she needs.  This way, her quality of life will improve and she will get closer to fulfilling her dreams.

loans.use: to buy animals

loans.name: Carlos Tomas

texts.es:
Carlos de 52 años de edad, es originario de Quezalguaque municipio de La ciudad de León, es casado, tiene 4 hijos, el es agricultor se dedica a  este oficio desde muy joven al cumplir 24 años sembró su propia parcela sembrando maíz y sorgo lo hizo con el apoyo de su padre, también aprendió sobre la comercialización de granas básicos. Hoy en día tiene  su casa propia con su parcela de siembra y herramientas agrícolas aunque talvez no sean las mas modernas pero le funcionan  aun para poder sembrar. Sus aéreas de comercialización son el municipio de Telica cerca de León. 
El esta solicitando el préstamo para comprar insumos, fertilizantes para sembrar sorgo. 
El espera sacar una producción de que tenga altos rendimientos y de calidad que le permitan cubrir los costos y puede sacar ganancias que le permitan volver a invertir y comprar un vehículo de trabajo que le permitan transportar su producto  para ya no tener que pagar transporte privado y reducir esos costos pues son muy caros para el siempre quiere seguir sembrando hasta donde mas pueda pues el oficio que aprendió y disfruta mucho haciéndolo.
texts.en:
Carlos is 52 years old and is a native of Quezalguaque, a municipality of the city of León.  He is married and has 4 children.  He has been a farmer since he was very young.  With his father's help, he planted his own plot of land when he turned 24, growing corn and sorghum. He also learned about selling basic grains.   Today, he has his own house with a plot of land that he plants.  He also has his own farming tools and even though they may not be the most modern, they work for planting.  He sells his products in the town of Telica near León.  

He is requesting a loan to buy supplies and fertilizers for his sorghum crop.  He hopes to have a quality, high-yield production that will allow him to cover his costs and generate enough money so that he can invest and buy a work vehicle that will allow him to transport his products.  This way he won't have to pay for private transportation and reduce his costs as it is very expensive to be a farmer.  He wants to continue working in the trade that he learned as he really enjoys it.

loans.use: purchase supplies and fertilizer for his sorghum crop.

loans.name: Maria Naila

texts.es:
La clienta  es una mujer de  55 años de edad, casada, vive con su esposo y su hija . Doña Naila llego hasta la secundaria este  es su segundo crédito que nos solicita  a la Fundación con el primero tuvo una buena moral de pago, ella llego por primera vez a la fundación por que la recomendó una amiga. Es una mujer muy emprendedora que a pesar que  los asaltaron donde Vivian antes en Alajuelita,  la señora siguió adelante con el negocio  luchando y ahora compro casa en Ipis y y establecio la pulperia , le esta yendo muy bien pero necesita capital para surtirla, su espodo trabaja con ella ya que el es pensionado y le ayuda en el negocio,es una mujer muy responsable y luchadora.
   
La señora cuenta con una pulperia en su casa de domicilio, es propia, ella empezo hace 10 años con el negocio vendiendo chicles , este crédito Doña Naila lo invertirá en la compra de mercaderia para reforzar su capital como por ejemplo bolsas de arroz, frijoles, azúcar, sal aceites, chicles, confites, etc.

La clienta se levanta temprano y abre a las 5:30am de la mañana todos los días de lunes a domingos durante la mañana va haciendo las labores domesticas y su esposo le ayuda atender los clientes hace el almuerzo ellos no cierran al medio dia siguen vendiendo uno come a las 12:00pm y el otro a la 1:00pm de la tarde y cierran a la 8:00pm  de la noche

 La clienta con la  pulperia ha podido apoyar a su hija en los estudios de la universidad poco a poco han salido adelante con el esfuerzo de su hija y esposo, Ella  nos cuenta que ha sido muy duro pero hasta ahora se ve la claridad por eso nos solicita crédito para surtir su negocio este crédito le servirá para tener capital de trabajo
texts.en:
Naila is 55 years old, married, and lives with her husband and daughter.  She has a high school level of education.  This is Naila's second loan from Fundación Mujer.  She repaid her first loan well.  

Naila first arrived at Fundación Mujer through a recommendation from a friend.  She is a very entrepreneurial woman in spite of the fact that she was robbed where she used to live in Alajuelita.  She continued ahead determinedly with her business and now she has bought a house in Ipis and set up a grocery store there.  Her business is going very well but she needs capital in order to stock it.  Her husband works with her as he is retired and he helps her in her business.  Naila is a very responsible and tenacious woman.

Naila has a grocery store in her home which she owns.  She started her business ten years ago selling chewing gum.  She will invest this loan in buying merchandise to strengthen her capital such as bags of rice, beans, sugar, salt, oil, chewing gum, candies, etc.

Our client gets up early and opens her store at 5.30am every day, from Monday to Sunday.  During the morning she does her housework and her husband helps to serve the customers.  Then she makes lunch.  They don't close the store at midday but continue selling.  One of them eats at 12.00pm and the other at 1.00pm.  They close the store at 8.00pm.

Through her store, our client has been able to support her daughter in her university studies.  She has gradually got ahead with the effort of her daughter and her husband.  She tells us that it has been very hard but she can see the light.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan in order to stock her business.  This loan will provide her with working capital.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her business such as bags of rice, sugar, beans, salt, oil etc.

loans.name: Mwiala Shg Group

texts.en:
Moses is the facilitator of the Mwiala group. Moses and his group joined One Acre Fund in 2011 and will re-enroll in the 2012 program. 

With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Moses and his group during Kenya's next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund's integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit, and insurance. 

Moses takes care of one child at home. He joined One Acre Fund in order to enjoy the best prices of One Acre Fund and to have additional maize profits to educate his child and ensure food security for his family. In the 2011 season, Moses had a very good maize yield harvesting nine bags on ½ an acre of land. Before joining One Ace Fund, Moses was only able to harvest three bags of maize on ½ acre of land. 

With income from maize sales, Moses will invest in animal rearing and save for future use. 

In 2012, the members of Mwiala group will each plant between ½ and one acre of maize.

In the photograph Moses is pictured with his group members.

loans.use: To source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

loans.name: Yulisa Del Carmen

texts.es: Yulisa Del Carmen de 39 años. Tiene su negocio que es la venta de leche, hielo y bisutería se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues siempre esta ofreciéndoles a sus clientes un buen servicio. Yulisa es una mujer muy trabajadora con ganas de salir adelante para ella la disciplina es el mejor secreto en el trabajo, porque le permite realizar tus metas en el futuro, se ha decidido a solicitar un crédito que le permita comprar leche, bisutería. ella tiene fe que con su esfuerzo logrará darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Yulisa Del Carmen is 39 years old and has a business selling milk, ice and costume jewelry.  She has a lot of customers because she always offers her customers a good service.  Yulisa is a very hard-working woman who has a desire to get ahead in life.  Her best secret in her work is discipline because it allows her to achieve her future goals.

Yulisa has decided to request a loan which will allow her to buy milk and costume jewelry.  She is certain that, through her efforts, she will manage to provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy milk and costume jewelry

loans.name: Fatou

texts.fr: L'emprunteuse est une femme mariée  qui a à sa charge ses quatres enfants dont les deux sont à l'école.Elle exerce un commerce d'habits, de lait et de savon depuis près d'un an.Elle assure avec ses revenus l'alimentation de la famille ainsi que ses propres besoins.Elle sollicite un pret de 75000f pour acheter quatre caisses de savon, des habits pour enfants ainsi que du parfum.Son ambition est d'acheter un terran et d'y construire sa maison.
texts.en: This borrower is a married woman who has four children to support. Four of the children are in school. She has had a business selling clothing, lotions, and soaps for nearly a year. Using her revenues, she ensures that her family is fed and that she can support herself. She is requesting a loan of 75,000 francs to buy four cases of soap, some children's clothing, and perfume. Her ambition is to buy a plot of land and to build a house on it.

loans.use: to buy four cases of soap, children's clothing, and some perfume

loans.name: Zoraida Genoveva

texts.es:
Zoraida ahora de 61 años está muy contenta porque ha podido mejorar su vivienda en la parte delantera y pudo así mejorar los ingresos de su negocio ya que ella sigue trabajando como peluquera y ahora dando masajes.   

Tiene muchas aspiraciones de seguir creciendo personalmente y seguir con mayores ingresos para su familia. Ahora el prestamo lo quiere para construir otra parte de la casa que es un nuevo piso. para que su peluqueria quede con toda la parte de abajo de su casa y asi sus clientes tengan mas espacio. Comprar cemento, zinc etc.
texts.en:
Zoraida is now 61 years old.  She is very happy because she has been able to improve the front part of her home and thereby improve her income from her business.  She continues working as a hairdresser and now provides massages too. 

Zoraida has many aspirations to continue growing on a personal level and to continue making more income for her family.  She would like this loan to build another part of her home (a new floor) so that her hairdressing salon takes up the whole of the downstairs of her home and her customers will have more space.  She will buy cement, metal sheets, etc.

loans.use: to purchase sheets of metal, cement and sand

loans.name: Piedad De La Cruz

texts.es:
A sus 59 años de edad y como madre de 1 hija Piedad es una mujer emprendedora que se despierta día a día con la ilusión de sacar a su hija adelante, ella trabaja desde su casa brindándoles a sus clientes el servicio de cepillado y corte de cabello, esta labor la realiza desde hace 15 años, cuando hizo un curso capacitándose en esta actividad y al ver que era un negocio rentable decidió montar su propio negocio, una sala de belleza donde procura siempre prestar un servicio satisfactorio. 

Sueña con ver progresar su negocio, logrando una estabilidad económica, y es por esto que hoy solicita un préstamo para comprar mas herramientas de trabajo, como una silla adecuada para sus clientes, un lava cabezas, shampoo, laca, gomina y algunos insumos necesarios para el buen cuidado del cabello, ya que ella no cuenta con el capital para hacer esas compras, así espera aumentar sus ingresos y su calidad de vida mejorará notablemente.
texts.en:
Piedad is 59 years old and has one daughter.  She is an entrepreneurial woman who gets up every day with the desire to get her daughter ahead in life.  Piedad works from home, providing her customers with a hair brushing and hair cutting service.  She started out in this line of work 15 years ago when she took a course and trained in this business. Noting that it was a profitable trade, she decided to set up her own business: a beauty salon where she always tries to provide a satisfactory service.

Piedad dreams of seeing her business make progress and achieve financial stability.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan to buy more work tools such as a suitable chair for her customers, a sink for hair washing, shampoo, hairspray, hair gel and some supplies that are necessary for good hair care, as she doesn't have the capital she needs to make these purchases.  She thereby hopes to increase her income and her quality of life will notably improve.

loans.use: to buy supplies and work tools for her business

loans.name: Sylvia Elena

texts.es: La señora Sylvia Elena tiene 32 años tiene 2 hijos menores de edad a su cargo. Tiene 6 años trabajando con este negocio y se dedica a la venta de mercadería en general. En su vivienda cuenta con una pequeña vitrina donde exhibe ciertos productos. el crédito será utilizado para la compra de calzado, perfumes, ropa en general, prendas de plata, pinturas de labios y bolsos. Su dedicación es exclusiva porque el beneficio es para ella y su familia, por ello se esfuerza.
texts.en: Sylvia Elena is 32 years old and has two dependent children in her care.  She has been working in her business, selling general merchandise, for six years.  At home she has a small display case where she displays certain products.  She will use her loan to buy footwear, perfumes, clothes, silver jewelry, lipsticks and bags.  This business receives her complete commitment as the profit is for her and her family.  This is why she works hard.

loans.use: to buy footwear, perfume, clothes, silver jewelry, lipsticks and bags

loans.name: Antonio

texts.es: El señor: Antonio nacido en la población de Itapochi - Santa Cruz, radicando actualmente desde hace 10 años en la comunidad de San Miguel perteneciente al municipio de la Guardia, convive  con la señora Dionicia y tienen 5 hijos ya mayores, el sr. Antonio se dedica a la agricultura justamente desde hace 10 años, es su primer crédito y lo va a destinar a la siembra de maní y lo que implica el preparado de la tierra. El señor Antonio esta a punto de conseguir la titulación de sus tierras, por ello el trabaja con esmero en la agricultura, estando agradecido por el préstamo.
texts.en: Antonio was born in the town of Itapochi-Santa Cruz but has lived in the community of San Miguel, La Guardia, for the last ten years.  He lives with Dionicia; they have five children who are all adults now.  Antonio has been a farmer for the last ten years.  This is his first loan and he plans to use it for his peanut crops, specifically in soil preparation.  Antonio is about to secure legal title of his land so he works very diligently at farming.  He is grateful for the loan.

loans.use: to invest in his peanut crop.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es: Maria Del Carmen tiene 40 años, su actividad es brindar el servicio de joyería. Hace más de 13 años que tiene este negocio, en la actualidad realiza su trabajo desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 6 de la noche de lunes a sábado. Unas de sus dificultades es que tiene que tener mucho cuidado con su negocio  debido a la delincuencia que existe en el país. Con el préstamo quiere comprar oro, plata, oro blanco y otras herramientas necesarias. Unas de sus metas es poder tener un local propio y ofrecer sus productos.
texts.en: María Del Carmen, 40, sells jewelry.  She’s had this business for over 13 years.  Her current work schedule is 8am to 6pm, Monday through Saturday.  One of the difficulties she has is that she must be very careful with her business due to the current crime rate in the country.  She will use the loan to buy gold, silver, white gold and other necessary tools.  One of her goals is being able to have her own locale in which to sell her wares.

loans.use: to buy gold, silver, white gold and other necessary tools.

loans.name: Benetha

texts.en:
Benetha is 32 years old, lives in the airport community, and is married to a businessman. They have five children between 1 and 15 years old. 

For the past six years she has been selling plastic dishes. She has many customers and makes a lot of profit since she has a very good location for her business. She is requesting a loan to purchase more dishes for her business. Her plan is to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more plastic dishes for her business

loans.name: Lucia Hermita

texts.es:
Lucia es una mujer trabajadora que decidió hace 7 años atrás tener un pequeño negocio de confección de ropa ya que tuvo la oportunidad de tener una maquina industrial usada para arreglarla y así  comenzar con su negocio para poderle dar más tiempo a su familia. Poco a poco fue mejorando sus ingresos. 

Tiene muchas aspiraciones con su negocio por eso quiere mejorar sus ingresos con un préstamo para comprar materiales y telas para confeccionar mas ropa. En el futuro quiere tener un taller grande y dar empleo a otras mujeres para mejorar su estilo de vida.
texts.en:
Lucia is a hardworking woman who decided to start a small clothes making business seven years ago because she was presented with the opportunity to get a used industrial sewing machine, repair it and start the business so that she could spend more time with her family.  Gradually, her income improved.

She has many goals for her business so she wants to improve her income with a loan to buy fabric and supplies to make more clothes.  In the future, she’d like to have a large workshop and employ other women to improve their standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fabric and thread.

loans.name: Florecita Tepetlampa Group

texts.es:
Hermelindo es el es representante del grupo Florecita Tepetlampa, el cual se conforma por la señora Martina y Fernando. Martina se dedica a vender artículos de barro ella sale a ofrecer cazuelas y pan a las comunidades aledañas a la suya. Fernando se emplea como jornalero en el campo limpiando los plantíos de milpa o emigra a las zonas cálidas al corte de caña en la temporada de zafra, y desea utilizar el dinero para la compra de ganado.
Hermelindo se dedica a las actividades de albañilería dentro de su municipio el vive con su esposa Martha y sus hijos Silvia, Alfredo de nueve y tres años. Él quiere iniciar una tienda de abarrotes es por ello que solicitó un préstamo a Fundación realidad, pues así podrá comprar azucar, frijol, jabon, sal, aceite y demás productos que son básicos y que comunmente la gente consume.
El grupo tiene el sueño de tener negocios bien establecidos en su lugar de origen y demostrar a los demás habitantes que el trabajo en equipo trae consigo buenos resultados, así mismo quieren que su familia logre mejores condiciones de vida.
El grupo se encuentra muy agradecido con KIVA y FRAC por el crédito que les fue autorizado, el cual lo estarán empleando en actividades de comercio como son: compra de abarrotes azúcar, frijol, jabón, sal y venta de carne., por igual estarán comprando mas artículos de barro como cazuelas, jarros, pocillos, y una parte del crédito lo destinaran a la ganadería en la adquisición de cabezas de ganado caprino el cual se adapta y reproduce muy bien a las condiciones topográficas de la zona, ellos se encuentran plenamente seguros de que sus negocios serán prósperos ya que en algunos casos tienen varios años obteniendo ingresos de estos y en otros más afirman que no existen muchos negocios como el que van a iniciar en su comunidad.
texts.en:
Hermelindo is the representative of the group Florecita Tepetlampa which was formed by Martina and Fernando. Martina sells pottery. She goes out to sell casserole and bread dishes to nearby communities. Fernando is employed as a day laborer in the countryside clearing the corn fields, or he travels to warmer areas in the harvest season to cut cane. He would like to use the money to buy livestock. Hermelindo does his masonry work in the middle of town where he lives with his wife Martha and their children Silvia and Alfredo who are nine and three. He would like to open a grocery store which is why he has asked for a loan from Fundación Realidad. He will be able to buy sugar, beans, ham, salt, oil, and other basic goods that most people use. 

The group’s dream is to have well-established businesses in their home town to show the other townspeople that team work brings good results. They would also like to get a better quality of life for their families. The group is very thankful to KIVA and FRAC for the loan that’s been awarded to them which will be used for business activities like: the purchase of groceries such as sugar, beans, ham, salt, and meat. They will also buy more pottery items like casseroles dishes, jugs, and bowls.   A portion of the loan is for animal husbandry and the acquisition of goats which adapt and reproduce very well in the climate of the area. They are very confident that their businesses will be prosperous since in a couple of case they have several years of obtaining income from these, and others say that there aren’t  many businesses like those they will start in their community.

loans.use: to buy pottery like casserole dishes

loans.name: Martha Cristina

texts.es:
A sus 20 años de edad Martha es una emprendedora que desde muy pequeña se ha hecho cargo de su madre quien es una mujer con problemas de salud, Martha se dedica a vender ropa a domicilio, pues compra la mercancía y va a ofrecerla a sus vecinos, allegados y clientes que ha conseguido durante este tiempo. 

Su mayor sueño es mejorar la calidad de vida de su padre y para ello sabe que debe trabajar con esmero para mejorar inicialmente su situación económica. Actualmente se propuso mejorar los ingresos por lo que solicita un préstamo con el cual comprar la mercancía al por mayor como, blusas, jeans, ropa interior, y vestuario en general para hombres y mujeres, pues así las utilidades serán mayores y las ventas aumentarán proporcionalmente. A futuro espera tener su propio almacén y poco a poco progresar a nivel familiar, económico y laboral.
texts.en:
At the age of 20, Martha is an entrepreneur who took on the care of her ill mother from a very young age.  Martha sells clothes door to door.  She buys merchandise and then goes to sell it to neighbors, acquaintances and customers that she’s acquired over time.

Her greatest dream is to improve her parents’ life and she knows that she must work hard if she is to initially improve their economic situation.  She has proposed to improve her income so is asking for a loan to buy merchandise like blouses, jeans, underwear and clothing in general for men and women at wholesale so that profits will be higher and sales will increase proportionately.  In the future, she hopes to have her own store and gradually make progress at the family, economic and work levels.

loans.use: to buy clothes at wholesale.

loans.name: Jorge Antonio

texts.es: Jorge Antonio, está soltero y vive con sus padres y hermanos actualmente. El con el crédito va comprar herramienta básica para el taller mecánico. El cuenta con un taller con su padre de reparación de motocicletas y necesita una herramienta necesaria para desempeñar sus trabajos con más eficacia y rapidez. Él le quiere dar a su clientela un trabajo con mayor calidad y más rapidez en la reparación de las motos por lo cual hará la compra de estos instrumentos. El quiere generar de este crédito la mayor de las ganancias para su bienestar económico y así también darles a sus clientes más garantía en los trabajos y mejores resultados. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Jorge Antonio is single and currently lives with his parents and brothers. With the loan he will buy basic tools for his auto shop. He owns an auto shop with his father repairing motorcycles, and he needs a tool kit to do his job more quickly and efficiently. He wants to give his clientele good quality work and quicker repair service, and so he will purchase these tools. He wants this loan to generate more income for his financial well-being and also to give his clients more assurance in his work and better results. This is the first loan that he’s received from FUDECOSUR. He’s not had prior loans in established banks, but FUDECOSUR has awarded him this loan with great ease and with very low interest rates.

loans.use: to buy tools

loans.name: Akouavi Délali

texts.fr:
Akouavi Délali est une femme âgé(e) de 22ans. Elle est mariée å un  transitaire. Ils ont 01 enfant en charge.
Akouavi Délali travaille comme revendeuse de bijoux et pagnes de façon ambulante depuis 2007.
 Elle achète les produits au Grand Marché de Lomé et au BENIN. 
Akouavi Délali a requis son premier cycle de prêt à WAGES afin d’acheter des bijoux et pagnes. Elle veut ouvrir une boutique pour ne plus se déplacer.
texts.en:
Akouavi Délali, age 22, is married to a freight forwarder. They have one child to support. Since 2007, she's been working as an ambulant saleswoman, selling jewelry and "pagnes" (colorful African cloth).

She gets her supplies at the Grand Market in Lomé, as well as in Benin. She's seeking her first loan from Kiva's partner, WAGES, in order to buy jewelry and pagnes. She wants to open a shop so that she won't need to move anymore.

loans.use: to buy jewelry and "pagnes" (colorful African cloth)

loans.name: Sergio Nicolas

texts.es: El Sr. Sergio es un hombre trabajador, con ganas de superación y cada día se esfuerza para sacar adelante a toda su familia; es casado tiene un hijo mayor de edad, el Sr. Sergio se dedica a prestar el servicio de transporte realizando taxi por toda la ciudad de Nazca. Ya lleva en el negocio mas de 2 años; el crédito otorgado lo va a invertir en el mantenimiento y reparación de su vehiculo. Su principal sueño del Sr. Sergio es tener su propia línea de taxi. El Sr. Sergio esta muy agradecido por el crédito otorgado ya que con ello va a poder mejorar su unidad de trabajo.
texts.en: Sergio is a hardworking man with the desire to overcome. Every day he works hard so that his family can get ahead. He is married with one grown son. Sergio provides taxi services throughout the whole city of Nazca. He began this business more than two years ago. He will invest the awarded loan into the maintenance and repair of his vehicle. Sergio’s dream is to have his own route. Sergio is very thankful for the awarded loan since with it he can improve his one job.

loans.use: to maintain and repair his car.

loans.name: Concepcion

texts.es: Concepción tiene 52 años de edad. Trabaja duro para ofrecerle una vida mejor vida a su familia. Al darse cuenta de que no había muchas oportunidades de trabajo decide empezar este negocio que es una pulpería.  Está trabajando desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 9 de la noche. Ella solicita este crédito para la compra de granos básicos, detergentes, golosinas, entre otros. Su sueño es realizarle mejoras a su vivienda.
texts.en: Concepción, 52, works hard to provide a better life for her family.  Noting the lack of employment opportunities she decided to start this business: a grocery store.  She works from 8am until 9pm.  She’s requesting the loan to buy basic grains, detergents and snacks, among others.  Her dream is to do some home improvements.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, detergent and snacks, among others.

loans.name: Maria Antonia

texts.es: La señora Maria Antonia se dedica a la venta y elaboración de tortillas. Desde hace mas de 36 años que tiene este negocio, comenzó este negocio con la ayuda de su esposo quien siempre la apoyado fue así que comenzó a ampliar su actividad. Actualmente  solicita este crédito para la compra de cal, maíz, leña, comal entre otros productos. Su sueño es que su negocio crezca y que sus utilidades sean mejores para así darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en: Maria Antonia sells and produces tortillas. She has had this business for more than 36 years, having started out with her husband's help. He has always supported her and this is how she started to expand her business. She requests a loan t purchase lime, corn, firewood, a grill, and other products. Her dream is to make her business grow and that her profits will increase to provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase lime, corn, firewood, a grill, and other products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase merchandise such as cosmetics, articles for the home, school and high school supplies, gifts, skin lotions, and perfumes.

loans.name: Ana Graciela

texts.es:
A sus 55 años de edad Ana es una mujer luchadora que nunca se ha dejado vencer por las dificultades, por el contrario se ha dedicado a trabajar para sacar a su familia adelante, hoy en día divide su tiempo en 2 labores, en la semana cuida niños de su comunidad y los fines de semana vende comida en la ciclovía de Bello, un municipio del departamento de Antioquia.

Con la ilusión de seguir progresando, Ana quiere comprar los insumos necesarios para preparar los alimentos pero no cuenta con el capital para dichas compras por lo que solicita un préstamo que le permita surtir el negocio, mejorar las ventas y proporcionalmente mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
At the age of 55, Ana is a fighter who has never given up in face of difficulties. On the contrary, she has invested herself in her work to move her family forward. She divides her time between 2 businesses. During the week she takes care of children in her community and on the weekends she sells foods in Ciclovia de Bello, a municipality in the department of Antioquia.

With the dream of continual progress, Ana wants to purchase ingredients she needs to prepare foods. But she doesn't have the capital funds for these purchases. For this reason she requests a loan. It will permit her to supply her business, to improve her sales, and consequently, to improve the quality of her life.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients to prepare foods.

loans.name: Gaspard

texts.fr:
Monsieur Gaspard est un jeune sénégalais de 33 ans,  responsable de 2 enfants qui ont respectivement un et 2 ans. C’est un célibataire qui évolue dans le domaine de l’encadrement d’élèves  qui étudient  au lycée  ou au collège. Il a une expérience de 10 ans dans ce domaine. 
Ce qui l’a poussé  a faire son choix c’est la forte sollicitation des certains élèves de son quartier qui comptaient sur son savoir dans certaines matières telles que les maths  et la  physique-chimie pour se faire assister. C’est ainsi que grâce  a ses prestations de services il  parvient  à se procurer des revenus qui lui permettent de satisfaire les besoins quotidiens de la famille. L’avantage qu’il en tire concerne la meilleure connaissance et la maitrise du programme scolaire. Il est membre d’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC depuis mars 2008. Il sollicite un crédit de 360 000 frs prévu pour la construction d’une salle d’étude dans laquelle il pourra installer les élèves qu’il encadre. Ce financement lui permettra certes d’améliorer le cadre et le niveau de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Mr. Gaspard is a young Senegalese, 33 years old, who has two children, aged 1 and 2, in his care. He is unmarried and works in the domain of training students at the high school or the middle school. He has ten years of experience in this domain. What drove him to choose this were the strong requests from certain students in his district who were counting on his knowledge for help in certain subjects, such as math and physical chemistry. Thanks to his abilities, he manages to acquire an income allowing him to meet the everyday needs of his family. His advantage is a better understanding and mastery of the school curriculum. 

Mr. Gaspard has been a member of a U-IMCEC branch since March 2008. He is requesting a loan of 360,000 francs for building a private study hall where the students he trains can be situated. This financing will surely enable him to improve his family's living standard and conditions.

loans.use: to build a private study hall

loans.name: Juana Del Carmen

texts.es: Juana Del Carmen tiene 52 años tiene tres hijos entre las edades de 16, 32 y 22 años, actualmente solo uno está bajo su cargo. Juana se dedica a la venta de mercadería en general. Inicio este negocio con pequeños productos de manera ambulante fue con el paso del tiempo que logro obtener sus clientes y además crecer con su negocio. Su horario para empezar este trabajo es de las 8 de la mañana hasta las 8 de la noche luego de su jornada laboral, llega a su casa e inicia su labor como ama de casa. Este crédito es para la compra bolsos, cremas, calzado, perfumes y ropa en general.
texts.en: Juana Del Carmen is 52 years old and she has three children, aged 16, 32, and 22 years old. Currently only one of them is in her care. Juana sells general merchandise. She started out this business selling small products itinerantly. With the passage of time she acquired a clientele and she also expanded her business. Her schedule to start work is at 8 in the morning until 8 at night. When her work duties are complete she arrives at home to do her household work as a housewife. This loan will be used to purchase handbags, skin lotions, shoes, perfumes, and clothing in general.

loans.use: to purchase handbags, skin lotions, shoes, perfumes, and clothing in general.

loans.name: Koffi

texts.fr:
Koffi est  un homme âgé de 28ans. Il est marié  å une revendeuse. Il a 01 enfant. 
Koffi travaille comme revendeur de portables et accessoires dans un quartier de la place depuis 2002.
Koffi a requis son premier crédit à WAGES afin d’acheter des portables et accessoires de portables.
texts.en: Koffi is 28 years old and married to a saleswoman. The couple have one child. Koffi has been selling mobile phones and mobile phone accessories in his district since 2002. He is requesting his first loan from WAGES in order to restock on phones and accessories.

loans.use: to buy mobile phones and mobile phone accessories for resale.

loans.name: Cramita Benilda

texts.es:
Carmita de 39 años, es una mujer trabajadora que es vendedora de cosméticos. Poco a poco fue desarrollando su negocio con variedades de cosméticos. En la actualidad trabaja vendiendo los productos por revistas a sus vecinos y amigos. 

Tiene muchas aspiraciones con su negocio por eso quiere comprar mas cosméticos, perfumes para mejorar y variar la mercadería que ahora tiene ya que quiere que sus clientes tengan mas oportunidad al comprar la mercadería.
texts.en:
Carmita is 39 years old and she is a very hardworking woman. She is a cosmetics vendor. Gradually she developed her business to include a variety of cosmetics. Currently she works selling all of types of products through magazines to her neighbors and her friends.

She has great aspirations for her business, which is why she wants to purchase more cosmetics and perfumes. She will improve and add variety to the merchandise she now has. She wants to give her clients more opportunities to purchase merchandise.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics and perfumes.

loans.name: Rosa María

texts.es:
Rosa es una mujer de 34 años y es divorciada, vive con sus cinco hijos que tienen 16, 15, 11, 10 y 6 años de edad, al sur de la ciudad de Quito capital del Ecuador. Su residencia está ubicada en la parroquia llamada "Chillogallo", un sector populoso´, tradicional y pintoresco de la capital.

Rosa trabaja vendiendo café con "empanadas de viento" y "bolones de verde", unos bocaditos exquisitos y tradicionales del Ecuador en un mercado de la parroquia donde vive. Este negocio lo aprendió de su madre. Trabaja hasta 13 horas al día y en su tiempo libre se dedica a las labores del hogar. Nos comenta que al inicio no era fácil trabajar en este negocio ya que la Policía Metropolitana desalojaba a quienes como Rosa vendían sus productos sin permiso municipal. Pero las cosas han cambiado y ella ya está bien ubicada y con los permisos que se requiere para esta actividad.

Esta mujer trabajadora quiere arreglar su vivienda por lo que ha recurrido a Fundación Alternativa en busca de un crédito y de esta manera que sus hijos vivan en una vivienda más digna.
texts.en:
Rosa is a 34-year old woman who is divorced. She lives with her five children, aged 16, 15, 11, 10 and 6. The live south from the city of Quito, capital city of Ecuador. Her residence is located in the Parrish named "Chillogallo", a populous sector in the capital that is traditional and picturesque.

Rosa sells coffee with "empanadas de viento", cheese and onion pastries, and "bolones de verde" , green plantain dumplings stuffed with cheese. They are delicious snacks which are traditional in Ecuador. She sells in a market in the Parrish where she lives. She learned this business from her mother. She works up to 13 hours per day and during her spare time she takes care of the house work. She tells us that in the beginning it was not easy to work in this business because the city police would move people like Rosa who would be selling their products without municipal permits. But things have changed and she is well situated now and she has the permits that she needs to her business. 

This hardworking woman wants to fix her house and it is the reason why she has approached Fundacion Alternativa (Kiva Field Partner). She requests a loan so that her children will have a more dignified home in which to live.

loans.use: to renovate her house.

loans.name: Las Marias Group

texts.es:
La Sra. Teresa cuenta con 51 años de edad es casada tienes dos hijos los cuales ya no estudian pero aun dependen de ella su esposo se llama silvestre él se dedica al campo.

Ella se dedica al comercio de pescadería ella vende pescado y también chicharrones en su colonia ella invertirá su préstamo en la compra de pescados y chicharrones ella espera que le beneficie y le ayude con sus negocio, a ella le gustaría hacer crecer su negocio.

La Sra. Teresa pertenece al grupo Las Marías el cual está integrado por dos hombres y once mujeres que a continuación son mencionadas:

La Sra. Paula cuenta con 52 años de edad, ella se dedica al comercio tiene un puesto de refrescos y va invertir su préstamo en surtir refrescos de varios sabores y jugos.
La Sra. Venancia cuenta 30 años de edad, ella se dedica al comercio vende verduras e invirtiera su préstamo en la compra de mas verduras como son: chile, jitomate, zanahoria, lechuga, etc.
La Srta. Marisol cuenta con solo 19 años de edad, ella se dedica al comercio vende refrescos e invertirá su préstamo en la compra de mas refrescos y jugos.
La Sra. Rosa Ícela cuenta con 21 años de edad, ella se dedica al comercio vende refrescos lo cual invertirá su préstamo en la compra de refrescos.
El Sr. Antonio cuenta con 20 años de edad, el se dedica al comercio de dulces lo cual invertirá su préstamo en la compra de más dulces.
La Srta. Yadira cuenta 21 años de edad, ella se dedica al comercio vende refrescos e invertirá su préstamo en la compra de mas refrescos.
La Srta. Silvia cuenta con 19 años de edad, ella se dedica al comercio vende perfumes lo cual invertirá su préstamo en la compra de perfumes y cremas, etc.
La Sra. Isabel cuenta 49 años de edad, ella  se dedica al comercio vende verduras lo cual invertirá su préstamo en la compra de verduras como son: chile, jitomate, papa, etc.
El Sr. Leonardo cuenta con 40 años de edad, el se dedica al comercio cuenta con pequeño negocio de refrescos lo cual invertirá su préstamo en la compra de mas refrescos de varios sabores y tamaños.
La Sra. Alixandra cuenta con 30 años de edad, ella se dedica al comercio vende tacos e invertirá su préstamo en la compra de los insumos que utiliza para elaborar la comida como son: chile, aceite, jitomate, etc.
La Sra. Rosa dalia cuenta con 37 años de edad, ella se dedica al comercio vende pollos lo cual invertirá su préstamo en la compra de mas pollos para vender.
La Sra. Alberta cuenta con 55 años de edad, se dedica al comercio vende tortillas lo cual invertirá su préstamo en la compra de los insumos que utiliza para hacer las tortillas como son: maíz, masa maseca, etc.
texts.en:
Teresa is 51 years old, married, and has two children who don’t go to school but are dependent on her. Her husband is Silvestre, and he works in the fields.  She works in the fish market. She sells fish and pork rinds  in her neighborhood. She will invest her loan in the purchase of fish and pork rinds. She hopes it will benefit and help her business. She would like to grow her business. 

Teresa belongs to the group Las Marías which is comprised of two men and eleven women who are listed below: Paula is 52 years old. She has a refreshments stall, and she will invest her loan in stocking various types of refreshments and juices. Venancia is 30 years old. She sells vegetables. She will invest her loan into the purchase of more vegetables like: chiles, tomatoes, carrots, lettuce, etc. Marisol is only 19 years old. She sells refreshments. She will invest her loan into the purchase of more refreshments and juices. Rosa Ícela is 21 years old. She sells refreshments and will invest her loan into the purchase of refreshments. Antonio is 20 years old. He sells sweets and will invest his loan into the purchase of more sweets. Yadira is 21 years old. She sells refreshments and will invest her loan into the purchase of more refreshments. Silvia is 19 years old. She sells perfumes and will inest her loan into the purchase of perfumes, creams, etc. Isabel is 49 years old. She will vegetables and will invest her loan into the purchase of vegetables like: chiles, tomatoes, potatoes, etc. Leonardo is 40 years old. He has a little refreshments business and will invest his loan into the purchase of more refreshments of various flavors and sizes. Alixandra is 30 years old. She sells tacos and will invest her loan into the purchase of ingredients that she uses to make food like: chiles, oil, tomatoes, etc. Rosa dalia is 37 years old. She will chickens and will invest her loan into the purchase of more chickens to sell. Alberta is 55 years old. He sells tortillas and will invest his loan into the purchase of ingredients that he uses to make tortillas like: corn, cornmeal, etc.

loans.use: to purchase fish and pork rinds

loans.name: Le Chateau Group

texts.fr:
Mme Abzeta est la représentante du groupe LE CHATEAU. Elle est mariée et mère de 07 enfants. Le plus âgé a 24ans le moins âgé a 04ans. 02 de ses enfants vont a l’école et elle a 08 personnes à sa charge.

Mme vend des condiments (choux, piments, aubergines). Elle exerce ce métier depuis 11ans. Elle s’approvisionne a Kombissiri village environnant. Ses clients sont les revendeurs, les femmes et hommes.

Mme veut  s’acheter 01 sac de choux, 01 sac d’aubergine et 01 plat de piment.

Elle épargne ses bénéfices et investi une partie dans son commerce. Mme ambitionne s’acheter un motocycle pour faciliter son déplacement.
texts.en:
Mrs. Abzeta represents the group LE CHATEAU.  She is married and the mother of 7 children.  The oldest is 24 and the youngest is 4.  Two of her children go to school and she has 8 people in her care.

Mrs. Abzeta sells food products (cabbage, peppers, and eggplants). She has been doing this type of work for 11 years.  She gets her supplies in the nearby village of Kombissiri.  Her customers are salespeople, men and women.

Mrs. Abzeta wants to buy one sack of cabbage, 1 sack of eggplants and one flat of peppers.

She saves her profits and invests a part of them in her business. Mrs. Abzeta hopes to buy herself a motorcycle to make it easier to get around.

loans.use:
to buy one sack of cabbage, 1 sack of eggplants, and one flat of peppers.
.

loans.name: Khady

texts.fr: Madame Khady  est une femme mariée sans enfant qui vit au Sénégal.  Elle est âgée  de 32 ans et s’active dans l e secteur de la couture depuis 1999. Elle a choisi cette activité par amour. C’est une profession  dont elle  a longtemps rêvé. Ce qui lui plait le plus c’est la créativité, le contact direct avec la clientèle et les relations qui sont nouées avec cette dernière.  Elle est sociétaire de l’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC depuis 2004. Elle a déjà remboursé 5 prêts  antérieurs. Elle sollicite un crédit de 100 000 frs prévu  pour l’achat d’une machine de broderie pour les besoins de son activité.  Ce financement lui permettra d’améliorer sa productivité  et ses gains financiers
texts.en:
Mrs. Khady is married and without children, and lives in Senegal. She's 32 years old, and since 1999, her field of business has been sewing. She chose this field out of love for it. It's a profession she dreamt of for a long time. What she likes the most is the creativity, and the direct contact with customers and the connections she creates with them.

She's been a member of Kiva's partner, UIMCEC, since 2004, and already repaid five previous loans. She's seeking a loan of XOF 100'000 intended to buy an embroidery machine for her business needs. This loan will enable her to improve her productivity and her financial profits.

loans.use: to buy an embroidery machine

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: renforcer son fonds de roulement

loans.name: Abdoul

texts.fr: L'emprunteur est un jeune qui tient une librairie- papeterie dans sa localité.Il vend des fournitures scolaires, des fournitures de bureau ainsi que des accessoires informatiques.Son activité lui assure des revenus qui lui permettent de prendre en charge ses propres besoins ainsi que ceux de sa famille.Afin d'augmenter son fonds de commerce et faire face à la forte demande en cette période de rentrée des classes, il sollicite un pret de 500000F pour acheter des cahiers, des bics, de la craie et d'autres articles divers.Son ambition est d'établir un grand magasin de vente en gros de fournitures scolaires et bureautique.
texts.en: The borrower is a young man operating a combined stationery and bookstore business in his area. He sells school supplies, office supplies and computer accessories. His business activity ensures sufficient income to support his own needs and those of his family. To increase his working capital and meet the high demand at the beginning of the school year, he is applying for a loan of 500,000 F to buy notebooks, pens, chalk and various other items. His ambition is to set up a wholesale department store for school and office supplies.

loans.use: buy notebooks, pens, chalk and various other items

loans.name: Anne Marie

texts.fr: L'emprunteuse est une femme qui a perdu son mari depuis sept ans.Elle vit seule avec ses 9 enfants dont 3 sont à l'école.Elle vend des tissus et des compléments alimentaires.Elle fait également de l'aviculture.Elle est assistante villageoise et appuie les femmes qui font des activités génératrices de revenus.Elle sollicite un pret de 500000F pour acheter des tissus "thioub", du vax, de la crépe soie, du basin qu'elle revendra à l'occasion de la fete de la Tabaski.Elle ambitionne de se lancer plus tard dans l'importation de produits vestimentaires.
texts.en:
Anne Marie was widowed 7 years ago and lives together with her 9 children, 3 of whom attend school. She sells fabrics and food supplements and is also a poultry farmer. She is her village´s "assistante villageoise" - a position traditionally held by a woman trained to function as a support for women's advancement groups - and helps the other businesswomen of her village.

Anne Marie is requesting a 500 000 franc loan so that she can buy fabrics including "thioub" (dyed indigo fabric), "vax", crimped silk and "basin" (African brocade) which she will resell to customers preparing for the festival of Tabaski. In the future, she would like to become an importer of clothes.

loans.use: to buy fabrics including "thioub", "vax", crimped silk and "basin".

loans.name: Maria Auxiliadora

texts.es: Maria Auxiliadora tiene 47 años. Ella se dedica a una pulpería, desde hace más de 6 años. La experiencia obtenida con este trabajo ha hecho que Maria obtenga un mejor servicio con sus clientes, pues la mayoría de ellos le solicitan hasta consejos. El crédito lo solicita para comprar más producto, como es granos básicos, detergentes, golosinas, sopas, fósforos, gaseosas, papel higiénico entre otros productos para el hogar. El sueño de ella es tener otro negocio y ampliar el inventario del que tiene actualmente.
texts.en: Maria Auxiliadora is 47 years old. She has had a grocery store for more than 6 years. The experience she has earned through her business has permitted Maria to offer a better level of service to her clients. The majority of them come to her even for advice. The loan which she requests will be used to purchase more products, such as basic grains, detergents, sweets, soups, matches, soft drinks, bathroom tissue, and other products for the home. Her dream is to have another business and to increase her inventory from what she has now.

loans.use: to purchase basic grains, detergents, sweets, soups, matches, soft drinks, bathroom tissue, and other products for the home.

loans.name: Mor Talla

texts.fr: L'emprunteur est un homme marié, père de trois enfants.Il tient une petite unité de transformation des céréales locales à coté du marché de son quartier.Il dispose de six machines qui transforme le mil, l'arachide et le haricot.Ainsi, il produit de la patte d'arachide, de l'huile, du café touba ainsi que de la farine.Son activité, en plus d'etre très utile pour les populations, lui procure des ressources pour prendre en charge sa famille.Pour moderniser son équipement, il sollicite un pret de 400000F afin d'acheter une machine électrique de production d'huile d'arachide.Il ambitionne d'installer d'autres unités dans sa ville.
texts.en:
This borrower is a married father of three. He runs a small processing plant near the neighborhood market. He has six machines to process local grains such as millet, peanuts and beans. This enables him to produce peanut paste, oil, touba coffee and flour. In addition to providing an important service for the people, this activity allows him to support his family. 

In an effort to modernize his equipment, he is seeking a loan of 400,000F to purchase an electric machine for the production of peanut oil. He hopes someday to open other such processing units around the city.

loans.use: to buy an electric machine to make peanut oil.

loans.name: Cheikh

texts.fr: L'emprunteur est un homme marié pèer de quatre enfants.Ancien chauffeur de taxi,il a ouvert une cantine de vente de pièces détachéées automobile.En plus, il a acheté un véhicule d'occasion et a recruté un chauffeur pour faire du transport urbain.Avec ces deux activités, il parvient à prendre en charge l'essentiel des besoins de sa famille.Il solicite un pret de 500000f pour acheter un moteur neuf et retaper son taxi.Il ambitionne d'ouvrir d'autres cantines de vente de pièces détachées.
texts.en: The borrower is a married man and the father of four. A former taxi driver, he opened a store to sell spare automobile parts. In addition he bought a used car and hired a driver to provide taxi transportation services in the city. Thanks to these two business activities, he manages to provide for the basic needs of his family. He is requesting a loan of  500000 West African francs in order to buy a new engine and  have his taxi repaired. His goal is to open other stores selling spare parts.

loans.use: to buy a new engine and have his taxi repaired

loans.name: Cheikh

texts.fr: L'emprunteur est un jeune célibataire qui vend des pneus depuis 2008.Il a démarré son activité avec un financement de 500000F de l'UIMCEC.Son Son activité lui permet d'aider sa famille notamment ses deux parents ainsi que ses frères et soeurs.Il sollicite un nouveau pret à l'UIMCEC de 500000f pour acheter 90 pneux.Son ambition est d'installer dans sa localité une grande société de vente de pneux.
texts.en: The borrower is a young bachelor who has been selling tyres since 2008.He started up his business with a loan of 500000F from UIMCEC. His activity enables him to help his family, in particular his parents as well as his brothers and sisters. He requests a new loan of 500000F from the UIMEC for the purchase of 90 tyres. His ambition is to set up  a big tyre selling company in his town.

loans.use: buy 90 tyres.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase a sewing machine.

loans.name: Mbaye

texts.fr: L'emprunteur est un enseignant, marié et père de 2 anfants.En plus de sa petite famille, il a en charge 4 jeunes élèves qui lui viennent du village ainsi que trois frères de son épouses. Pour améliorer ses revenus et pouvoir subvenir aux besoins des personnes qui sont à sa charge,il pratique en meme temps l'agriculture et l'embouche ovine.A l'approche de la fete de Tabaski (fete du mouton), il sollicite un pret de 500000f pour acheter 20 moutons qu'il revendra sur le marché local.Son ambition est de réaliser une ferme agropastorale dans son village d'origine.
texts.en:
Mbaye is a teacher, married, and the father of two children. In addition to his little family, he has to support 4 pupils from the village, as well as three brothers of his spouse's.

In order to increase his income and be able to provide for the people he has to support, he both farms and raises sheep. Since Tabski (Eid al-Adha) is approaching, he's seeking a loan of XOF 500'000 in order to buy 20 sheep to resell at the local market. 

His ambition is to establish an agropastoral farm in his home village.

loans.use: to buy 20 sheep

loans.name: Koami

texts.fr:
Koami est un homme âgé de 37 ans. Il est célibataire.
Koami est revendeur d’articles scolaires il ya 05ans. Il a ses clients de part et d’autres dans la ville de Lomé.
Koami a requis son second cycle de crédit à WAGES afin d’acheter des articles scolaires. Il achète au Grand Marché de Lomé.
texts.en:
Koami, age 37, is single. He started reselling school supplies five years ago. He has customers all across Lomé. 

Koami is seeking his second loan from Kiva's partner, WAGES, in order to buy school supplies at the Grand Market in Lomé.

loans.use: to buy school supplies

loans.name: Michael Elizabeth

texts.es: Michael Elizabeth tiene 27 años, su actividad es brinda el servicio de costura. Su negocio consiste en la reparación de prendas de vestir y además en la elaboración de prendas que sus clientes le realizan. Ella inicio esta actividad por su hija que tenía que proporcionarle los ingresos necesarios como alimento, vestimenta y educación. Para ella ha sido muy difícil continuar con esta actividad pues hay mucha competencia en el mercado pero no ofrecen el mismo servicio que Michael. El crédito es para la compra de hilos, telas, tijeras, bordados, cintas, decoraciones para la elaboración de sus prendas.
texts.en: Michael Elizabeth is 27 years old and her business is providing sewing services. Her business consists of repairing articles of clothing and she also produces clothing that her clients request. She started out this business because she needed to support her daughter. She needed to provide her with her basic needs, such as food, clothing, and education. It has been very difficult for her to keep up her business, especially because there is so much competition in the market - although no one offers the same service as Michael. The loan is to purchase thread, fabrics, scissors, appliqués, ribbons, and decorations to produce articles of clothing.

loans.use: to purchase thread, fabrics, scissors, appliqués, ribbons, and decorations to produce articles of clothing.

loans.name: Ablaye

texts.fr: L'emprunteur est un jeune qui a arrete ses études aprèes deux ans au collége pour aller travailer afin d'aider sa famille.Il s'est alors lancé dans le commerce de pièces détachées et de matériel audio.Après cinq, il achéte une cantine au marché central et ouvre un compte à l'UIMCEC. Pour augmenter son fonds de commerce , il sollicite auprès de l'institution un pret de 300 000f et compte acheter 2 appareils de télévision, 2 DVD, 08 téléphone portables et des accessoirs. Il est marié et pére de trois enfants.Son ambition est d'ouvrir un grand magasin de vente en gros d'appareils audiovisuels.
texts.en:
This borrower is a young man who left school after 2 years of middle school so that he could work to help his family. At that time, he began selling small spare parts and audio equipment. Five years later, he opened a booth at the central market and opened an account at UIMCEC. To increase his working capital, he is asking for a loan of 300,000 francs which he plans to use to buy 2 TVs, 2 DVD players, 8 mobile phones and accessories.

He is married and the father of 3 children. His goal is to open a large wholesale store for audio-visual equipment.

loans.use: to buy 2 TVs, 2 DVD players, 8 mobile phones and accessories.

loans.name: Kossiwa

texts.fr:
Kossiwa est une femme âgée de 41 ans. Elle est célibataire avec 01 enfant en charge.
Kossiwa travaille comme revendeuse de pagnes depuis 2005. Elle a de nombreux clients et les sert dans un marché de la place après achat à Lomé.
Kossiwa a requis son second crédit à WAGES afin d’acheter des pagnes et revendre pour avoir de bénéfices.
texts.en: Kossiwa is a 41-year-old woman. She is single with one child to take care of. Kossiwa has been selling traditional pagne cloth since 2005. She has numerous clients and serves them in a local market after buying her supplies in Lomé. Kossiwa got her second loan at WAGES in order to buy traditional pagne cloth to sell to make a profit.

loans.use: to buy traditional pagne cloth

loans.name: Serigne

texts.fr: L'emprunteur est un jeune célibataire  qui vit avec ses deux parents, ses 4 frères et une soeur.Il gère une mercerie qui lui assure des revenus assez consistants pour aider sa famille à prendre en charge ses besoins quotidiens.Il sollicite un pret de 300000F pour acheter quatres caises de lait de beauté et trois caisses de parfum et d'autres produits divers.
texts.en:
Serigne is unmarried and lives with his parents, his four brothers and one sister. He runs a notion store which provides him with an income consistent enough  to help his family take care of its daily needs.

He's seeking a loan of XOF 300'000 in order to buy 4 boxes of beauty milk, 3 boxes of perfume, and other various products.

loans.use: to buy 4 boxes of beauty milk, 3 boxes of perfume, and other various products

loans.name: María Manuela

texts.es:
María es una mujer de 46 años divorciada, vive y trabaja con su madre al sur de la ciudad de Quito, capital del Ecuador en la parroquia "Guamaní". Esta parroquia es una de las más grandes de la ciudad y muy populosa. Aquí están situadas algunas grandes fábricas de alimentos (franquicias y locales) e incluso ensambladoras de autos.

Junto a su madre María vende comida en un mercado cercano a su vivienda, la jornada es larga y nos cuenta que hay días en los que las ventas son bajas y esto las perjudica mucho. Sin embargo ellas quieren seguir trabajando y para atraer más clientela quieren arreglar su puesto de comida y así tener mayores ingresos. Por esta razón ella acudió a Fundación Alternativa en busca de un crédito que le ayude con sus planes de inversión.

María aún piensa en sus hijos que ya están casados y nos dice que "quisiera tener salud para seguir trabajando" y poder así ayudar económicamente a sus hijos
texts.en:
María is a 46-year-old, divorced woman.  She lives and works with her mother in the south side of the city of Quito, capital of Ecuador, in Guamaní Parish.  This is one of the city’s largest parishes and it’s very densely populated.  Large food factories (franchises and local) are located here as well as auto assembly plants.

María and her mother sell food in a market near their home.  The work day is long and she tells us that some days sales are low which is problematic for her.  Nevertheless, they want to continue working and, in order to attract more customers, want to make some improvements to their food stall to have more income.  Because of this, she called upon Fundación Alternativa in search of a loan that will help her with this investment plan.

María still thinks of her children who are all married and she tells us: “I’d like to stay healthy so that I can continue to work” to help her children economically this way.

loans.use: to make some improvements to her food stall.

loans.name: Diaraf

texts.fr: L'emprunteur est un enseignant qui pratique l'aviculture pour améliorer ses revenus.Il est marié et père de 5 enfants qu'il prend en charge à l'aide de son activité.Il sollicite un pret de 100000f de l'UIMCEC pour acheter 20 poussins de chair.Son ambition est d'élargir son élevage.
texts.en:
Diaraf is a teacher who also raises poultry to increase his income. He's married and the father of five children, whom he supports thanks to his business.

He's seeking a loan of XOF 100'000 from Kiva's partner, UIMCEC, in order to buy 20 chicks. He ambitions to expand his chicken farm business.

loans.use: to buy 20 chicks

loans.name: Yande

texts.fr: L'emprunteuse est une femme agée, mère de 7 enfants.Pour entretenir sa famille, elle mène une activité de commerce de produits alimentaires.Elle sollicite un pret de 100000F à l'UIMCEC pour acheter 4 sacs de riz et 200l d'huile .Elle ambitionne de construire sa propre botique.
texts.en: The borrower is a mature woman and the mother of seven. In order to support her family, she sells food products. She is seeking a loan of 100,000 West African Francs from UIMCEC in order to buy four bags of rice and 200 liters [about 53 gallons] of vegetable oil. Her goal is to open her own store.

loans.use: to buy four bags of rice and 200 liters of vegetable oil

loans.name: Milena Del Socorro

texts.es: Milena Del Socorro de 59 años, tiene su negocio que es una sastrería. Hace más de 41 años que tiene esta actividad. Ella es una mujer ejemplar ya que a pesar de su avanzada edad no se cansa de trabajar para salir adelante y poder dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. Es muy honesta pero sobre todo emprendedora. Ha decidido hacer este crédito para la compra de hilos, tijeras, telas, dedales entre otros productos.
texts.en: Milena Del Socorro, 59, has had a tailor’s shop for over 41 years.  She is an exemplary woman who, despite her advanced age, does not tire of working to get ahead and to be able to provide her family with a better quality of life.  She is very honest but, above all, enterprising.  She has decided to take out this loan to buy thread, scissors, fabric and thimbles, among other items.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies.

loans.name: Talibe

texts.fr: L'emprunteur est un jeune marié sans enfants.Avec des économies tirés de sa première activité de vente à la sauvette de vetements, il achéte à son oncle une alimentation qu'il paie mensuellement.Il y vend des denrées de consommation courante et arrive avec ses bénéfices à épargner tout en participant à l'alimentation de la famille.Il sollicite un pret de 300000f pour acheter 6 sacs de riz et 200 litres d'huile.Son ambitionest d'ouvrir un magasin de vente en gros de produits alimentaires.
texts.en: The borrower is a recently married man without children. With his savings derived from his first business venture, selling clothing, he has bought a food stand from his uncle  and makes monthly payments to cover  the cost. He sells staples food and manages to put some money aside while supporting his family. He is  requesting a loan of  300,000 West African francs in order to buy six bags of rice and 200 liters [about 53 gallons] of vegetable oil. His goal is to open a wholesale store of food products

loans.use: to buy six bags of rice and 200 liters of vegetable oil

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy basic grains, vegetables, meats, chicken and disposable plates, among other items.

loans.name: Abdourahmane

texts.fr: L'emprunteur est un jeune qui tient dans une boutique de vente de produits alimentaires dans sa ville .Il est recemment marié et n'a pas encore d'enfants.Il soutient toutefois, avec son activité, sa famille notamment, ses deux parents et ses frères et soeurs.Il sollicite auprés de l'UIMCEC un pret de 200000f pour acheter du sucre, du riz, de l'huile, du savon , du lait et d'autres produits de consommation courante.Il ambitionne d'ouvrir un grand magasin de vente en gros au centre ville.
texts.en:
This borrower is a young man who has a grocery store in his city. He recently got married and has no children yet. Still, he supports his family, especially his two parents and his brothers and sisters, through his business. 

He is requesting a loan of 200,000 francs from the micro-finance institution U-IMCEC to buy some sugar, rice, oil, soap, milk, and other typical consumer items. His ambition is to open a large wholesale store in the downtown area.

loans.use: to buy sugar, rice, oil, soap, milk, and other typical consumer goods

loans.name: Ablayo

texts.fr:
Ablayo est une femme  âgé(e) de 29 ans. Elle est mariée à un gestionnaire.
Ablayo est couturière de profession et ajoute à cette fonction la vente des pagnes afin de mieux satisfaire ses clients depuis 2005. Elle a ouvert son atelier dans un quartier de la place et achète ses marchandises à Lomé.
Ablayo a requis son premier crédit à WAGES afin d’acheter des pagnes et prendre le reste pour aménager son atelier.
texts.en: Ablayo is a 29-year-old woman who is married to an administrator. Since 2005, she has been a clothier by profession and has included the sale of pagnes (colorful West African cloth) in order to satisfy her customers further. She opened her own shop in a local neighborhood, and she buys her merchandise from Lomé, the capital of Togo. Ablayo has requested her first loan from WAGES in order to buy pagne cloth and to use the rest to renovate her workshop.

loans.use: to buy traditional cloth

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy 2 packets of wool, a dozen hair extensions for hairdressing, and beans

loans.name: Loma Buenavista Group

texts.es:
El grupo de "Loma Buenavista" está integrado por seis integrantes son cuatro hombres y dos mujeres, los integrantes del grupo decidieron ponerle así ya que el lugar donde viven está en la cima de un cerro y desde ahí se puede observa un bello panorama boscoso donde las heladas no han perjudico a los arboles el grupo ya existía anteriormente sin embargo los clientes anteriores cayeron en mora y tuvieron muchos problemas, así que ahora todos ellos son los nuevos integrantes del grupo, excepto Carlos S. que estaba desde el primer préstamo.
Don Juan quien ha quedado como representante del grupo tiene 39 años de casado, está casado con la señora Lorenza desde hace 27 años, juntos han procreado cuatro hijos, Eduardo quien tiene 12 años está estudiando la secundaria, Anayeli de nueve años cursa primaria, Wendy de 7 años está estudiando en S. año de secundaria y Juan el más pequeño esta en preescolar con 5 años de edad.
El señor Juan se dedica a la crianza de borregos para luego venderlos cuando estos ya están grandes, en la actividad lleva ya 28 años. en todo este tiempo no ha tenido ningún problema ya que los cuida muy bien y los lleva al veterinario si enferman.
Esta vez ha solicitado el crédito para comprar dos borregos tenía en casa pero vendió y ahora volverá  a empezar otra vez, la esperanza que tiene don Juan es que sus animales crezcan y reproduzcan para poder incrementar su ganado y ganancias.
Los restantes del grupo también compraran borregos casi nadie compra alimento ya que aprovechan el pasto que hay en la comunidad para ahorrase lo del alimento, todas los días los sacan a pastar. Solo el señor Carlos quien comprara pollos también para criar para luego vender.
"Estamos muy agradecidos por la nueva oportunidad que nos ofrecen y estamos seguros que como grupo no quedaremos mal"
texts.en:
The group "Loma Buenavista" (Loma Beautiful View) is comprised of six members, four men and two women. The members of the group decided to name it that because the area where they live is at the top of a hill and from there you can see a beautiful wooded landscape where the frost does not harm the trees. The group has existed before but the clients were in arrears and had many problems. Today all of them are new members to the group, except for Carlos S. who’s been in the group since the first loan. 

Juan has been the representative of the group. He’s been married for 39 years, and he’s been married to Lorenza for 27 years. Together they have had four children, Eduardo who is 12 and in secondary school, Anayeli who is 9 and in primary school, Wendy who is 7 and in the second year of secondary school, and Juan who is the youngest at 5 years old and in preschool. 

Juan raises sheep and later sells them with they are grown. He has been in this business for 28 years. Now he doesn’t have any problem since he cares for them very well and he takes them to the veterinarian if they are sick. Now he has asked for a loan to buy two sheep he had at home but later sold, and now he will start again. Juan’s hope is that the animals he raises and breeds will be able to increase his stock and income. The others in the group will also buy sheep. Almost no one buys food since they take advantage of the pastures they have in the community in order to save on food. Each day they go to the pasture. Only Carlos will buy chickens, also for breeding and later resale. 

"We are very thankful for the new opportunity that they offer us and we are confident that as a group we will not lose face.”

loans.use: to buy two sheep

loans.name: Rosa Argentina

texts.es: Rosa Argentina tiene 55 años, desde hace 7 años que tiene este medio de vida. Ella tiene su negocio que es brindar el servicio de salón de belleza, inició su negocio ofreciendo sus servicios fue comprando ciertos productos poco a poco y así obtener lo que tiene hoy en día. Lo que más le gusta es brindar un buen servicio así sus clientes se encuentran satisfechos con este medio de vida. Este préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de pintura de labios, cremas, tratamientos, pintura de uñas, shampoo, peines, cepillos, entre otros.
texts.en: Rosa Argentina, 55, has had this means of support for the last 7 years.  Her business is providing beauty salon services.  She started the business offering her services buying just a few items gradually until she acquired everything she has to date.  What she likes best is providing good customer service so that her customers will feel satisfied with this way of life.  She will use this loan to buy lipsticks, creams, treatments, nail polish, shampoo, combs and brushes, among others.

loans.use: to buy lipsticks, creams, treatments, nail polish, shampoo, combs and brushes, among others.

loans.name: Maguette

texts.fr: L'emprunteuse est une femme mariée, mère de 4 enfants.Elle mène une activité de ocommerce de produits alimentaire et assure la prise en charge de se enfants avec cette activité.Elle sollicite un pret de l'UIMCEC de 150000 pour renforcer son fonds de commerce.Elle compte acheter 10 sacs de mil et 100 litres d'huile de palm.Elle ambitionne de construire une grande boutique devant son domicile.
texts.en:
This borrower is a married woman and mother of four children. She sells food products, an activity that allows her to support her family. 

She is seeking a loan of 150,000F from her U-IMCEC branch to strengthen her working capital. She will use the loan to buy 10 sacks of millet and 100 liters of palm oil. She would like someday to set up a large shop in front of her house.

loans.use: to buy 10 sacks of millet and 100 liters of palm oil

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy 200 kg of recyclable metals

loans.name: Kaay  Bakh Group

texts.fr: Le groupe "KAAY BAKH" est composé de 5 femmes mariées qui pratique toutes le commerce.Elles appuient leurs maris dans la prise en charge des besoins de leurs familles respectives notamment ceux alimentaires.Le chef de groupe est mère de quatre enfants dont deux sont à l'école élémentaires.Elles vend des denrées de consommation courantes sur une table installée devant son domicile.Elle envisage d'y implanter une cantine pour élargir son commerce aux céréales locales.Le groupe sollicite un pret de 300000F pour acheter des denrées alimentaires tels que le riz, le mil, l'arachide.
texts.en: The "KAAY BAKH" group is made up of five married women who are all sellers.  They support their husbands in meeting their families' expenses, especially food expenses.  The head of the group is a mother of four children, two of whom are in elementary school.  She sells common food staples on a table in front of her house.  She plans to build a stall there to enlarge her business to local grains.  The group is requesting a loan of 300,000F to buy food staples such as rice, millet, and peanuts.

loans.use: to buy food staples like rice, millet, and peanuts.

loans.name: Aly

texts.fr: L'emprunteur est un soudeur métallique qui est employé dans un atelier de soudure.Il fait néanmoins trés souvent de la consultance pour des particuliers. Il entretient avec son activité toute sa famille.Pour ouvrir son propre atelier, il sollicite un pret de 250000F .Il compte acheter des machines de soudure ainsi que des consommables.
texts.en: The borrower is a metal welder who works in a welding workshop.  He also very often does private jobs for clients on his own.  He is supporting his entire family with his business.  In order to open his own workshop, he is requesting a loan of 250,000F.  He plans to buy welding machines as well as materials.

loans.use: to buy welding machines and materials.

loans.name: Pedro Victorino

texts.es:
Don Pedro de 64 años de dad, es originario de Quezalguaque municipio de León, es padre de tres hijos, es el agricultor, el siembra guayabas (fruta tropical), guanábanas y granos básicos.
